thread.title: Director Omung Kumar visits Wagah border for Sarabjit biopic
thread.title_full: Director Omung Kumar visits Wagah border for Sarabjit biopic - Entertainment

author: The Hitlist Team
title: Director Omung Kumar visits Wagah border for Sarabjit biopic
text:
Director Omung Kumar and cinematographer Kiran Deohans at the Wagah border while location hunting for their upcoming film, 'Sarabjit', which stars Aishwarya Rai Bachchan.

The film is based on Indian villager Sarabjit Singh, who who spent 22 years in a Pakistan jail on espionage charges.
